Formulas.Description: ElectroMagnetic Amplifed by Stimulated Emission of Radiation Weapon
Formulas.Mass: PropertyValue('Power Input') / 1000 + PropertyValue('Chamber Volume') + PropertyValue('Radiator Volume')

Properties.Name: Range
Properties.DescriptionFormula: '(Legacy) Maximum range at which the laser can fire at'

Properties.Name: ReloadRate
Properties.DescriptionFormula: '(Legacy) How much of a delay there is between laser pulses'

Properties.Name: Power Input
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'How much power the laser consumes'

Properties.Name: Chamber Volume
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Volume of the chamber'

Properties.Name: Lens Diameter
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Diameter of a laser'

Properties.Name: Charge Period
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'How much of a delay there is between laser pulses'

Properties.Name: Duty Cycle
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'What percentage of the lasers charge period is spent firing '

Properties.Name: Target Wavelength
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'What the wavelength of the output energy weapon is '

Properties.Name: Focal Length
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Distance to target (debug)'

Properties.Name: Emissitivity
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'How emissive radiators are (tech)'

Properties.Name: Radiator Volume
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Volume of the chamber'

Properties.Name: Radiator Thickness
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'How thick radiators are (debug)'

Properties.Name: Radiator area
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'How much area radiators have (debug)'

Properties.Name: Operating Temprature
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'What temp the laser operates at'

Properties.Name: Input Light
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Energy out put of a laser pulse'

Properties.Name: Chamber Absorption
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'What percentage of stored light in the chamber is lost as heat (tech)'

Properties.Name: Conversion Efficency
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'What percentage of input energy gets converted into light (tech)'

Properties.Name: Lense Emission
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'What percentage of stored light is fired (tech)'

Properties.Name: Pulse Energy
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Energy output of a laser pulse'
Properties.PropertyFormula: PropertyValue('Lense Emission') * (PropertyValue('Input Light') - PropertyValue('Input Light') * Exp(PropertyValue('Chamber Absorption') * -1 * PropertyValue('Charge Period'))) / PropertyValue('Chamber Absorption')

Properties.Name: Thermal Output
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Waste Thermal heat output by laser'
Properties.PropertyFormula: (PropertyValue('Power Input') * PropertyValue('Charge Period') - PropertyValue('Pulse Energy')) / PropertyValue('Charge Period')

Properties.Name: Beam waist
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Width of beam at focal length (debug)'
Properties.PropertyFormula: PropertyValue('Operating Temprature') * PropertyValue('Operating Temprature') * PropertyValue('Focal Length') * 0.000000001 * PropertyValue('Target Wavelength') * ( 1 / PropertyValue('Lens Diameter') )

Properties.Name: genericWpnAtbArgs
Properties.DescriptionFormula:
'int magSize, int reloadPerSec, int amountPerShot, int minShotsPerfire
AtbConstrArgs(PropertyValue('Charge Period') * PropertyValue('Power Input'), PropertyValue('Power Input'), PropertyValue('Pulse Energy'), 1)

Properties.Name: genericBeamWpnAtbArgs
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'int range, double wavelength, int wattage

Formulas.Description: A tube that houses missiles and launches them

Properties.Name: Max Calibre
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Maximum diameter of missile this can launch.'

Properties.Name: Max Length
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Maximum Length of missile this can launch'

Properties.Name: Max Mass
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Maximum Mass of missile this can launch'

Properties.Name: Auto Reloader Mass
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Increases the mass of the weapon, but increases the rate of fire.'

Properties.Name: Power Use
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'In MegaJules.'

Properties.Name: genericWpndbargs
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'int magSize, int reloadPerSec, int amountPerShot, int minShotsPerfire, WpnTypes type
